July 2012 - May 2016\n\n    \u2022 Btech in mechanical engineering from Jaypee University of Engineering and Technology (2012-\n2016)\n\nPROJECTS\nCuration\nNudity detector app\n\n    \u2022 Developed an app which filters the nude, explicit, violent, shady images when uploaded and can\neffectively tag them accordingly. Used open source API algorithmia or indicoio can also be used. (All\nthe API's are made over an open source AI - illustration tagger). The accuracy of the app is 85%.\n\nSentiment analyzer\nSentiment analysis app\n\n    \u2022 Developed an app which analyzizes the content posted by blogger as happy, sad, angry, violence etc.\nCan also be used by scraping content of the website or analyze the comments posted by the users.\n\nFacebook messenger chat bot\nChat bot\n\n    \u2022 The chat bot uses beta version of messenger app. The bot can send texts with the help of api.ai to it's\ntesters. Can be used to transfer money using paytm payment gateway.\n\nMonitoring\nSite down notifiers\n\n    \u2022 This project strictly uses python requests module. It monitors all the sites and reports back if it is\ndown/times out (response time > 9.0 sec). The project is work in progress. Can be made better if DNS\nand cloud flare issues can be resolved\n\nQR Code Scanner\nScans QR code\n\n    \u2022 This is a basic project which generates QR code for all the employees in the company and keeps a\nrecord of their arrival and departure time. The QR code is scanned using repo owners lappy. Used\npygame camera module to scan the QR code of the employee and records it in database.\n\nCOMPUTER SOFT SKILLS\nFront end : Good knowledge of HTML, CSS and bootstrap\nLanguages and frameworks : Python in context to django framework. Usage of jenkins CI for\n\ncontinuous integration, Celery with broker rabbitmq\n\n\n\nVersion control : Git.\nDatabase used : Sqlite3, PostgreSQL, mongoDB etc.\n\nAREA OF INTEREST\n\n    \u2022 python backend web developing using django\n\n\n"
